answers.answer: Sounds exactly like diabetic symtoms.  See a Doctor 4 sure now !  Especially if your losing weight fast.
Is it possible to happen at my age?

You should go and see a doctor ASAP!I was diagnosed with Diabetes, Type 1, 3 years ago (I was 13), with exactly the same symptoms - close to coma. I'm not joking, and sure - it can hit you at any age, even one day before your death.

question: Hi all,I am 27 years old male.I am currently very thirsty all day long,I drink plenty of water, esp at night and even middle of the night I woke up and drink water.I pee every 10 minutes or half an hour.I feel muscle ache and pain, also join pain, I am tired and headache eps at night time.From these symptoms could I possibly have diabetes? I am so worry now, do I need to go and see a doctor?
title: Could I possibly have diabetes?
